introduction: A very high prolific couple is settling their divorce mutually. They don’t have children’s. They don’t want anything from each other not even a single penny. But, they are fighting over the custody of their dog jimmy. But, wait? The Dog’s separation also focuses the true concept of singularity which is rapidly spreading in the world today. This technological suspense thriller has a character which replicates the real life of world’s richest technologist. We have shown his negative side, his vouch for ruling the world with the use of the technology and AI.
